name: Action Truck Racer
description:
Action Truck Racer - Truck Game!

You're an enraged madman on a destructive rampage through the city!

Crash through obstacles, exploding barrels crushing cars and get insane air with huge jumps on your way to the Supermarket!

Each level progressively gets harder to challenge your driving skills and test your ability to cause destruction!

Earn stars by causing more destruction throughout the city! But be quick, the longer you take the more your score drops!! If you cause enough havoc, you'll find yourself being reported on the news!
